extendedInfo.description: this is an android game that turns your phone into a virtual 3d glass maze that you tilt and turn to navigate a marble through. there are arrow and path indicators to help with navigation.Your best time through a level is stored so you can try to beat your best times.mazes may have multiple floors or floors at different angles or moving pieces.http://catgirlgames.wordpress.com/projects/maze/It runs well on the Samsung galaxy s phones i've tested it on. not so well on my galaxy tab.most people are experiencing some sort of issue with it running slow. if you experience any issues please leave a review with any bugs or problems.you can also post them as comments on the game's pagehttp://catgirlgames.wordpress.com/projects/maze/and see the project on pivotal trackerhttps://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/670837

reviews.title: Lots of potential
reviews.comment: A very basic idea for a game taken to another dimension. I look forward to more levels and challenges.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: i made this
reviews.comment: so of course i like it. please report any issues you have and i\'ll try to fix them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: A new spin on an old classic. I like it. Good to see your making games now too!!
reviews.author: Bob Boyles
